1209980.name: CaveBugBoy
1209980.description:
CaveBugBoy embarks on an epic adventure through dark and mysterious underground caves in search of a better life. The journey will encounter evil floating and screaming skulls, flying dead ants and flies, falling lava rocks, and collect bugs body parts.

- Beat +200 Levels
- Old fashion single-player platform adventure, added with razor edge sharp speed and new challenges
- Funny and sympathetic main player
- Map with 5 islands, 28 chapters and over +200 levels
- Collect small bugs body parts or cockroaches to unlock the next levels!
- Challenge the flying dead ants, dead flies and falling lava rocks!
- Find the treasure
- Face the danger!!!



“CaveBugBoy is an Early Access platforming adventure that will keep you on the edge of your seat.”
- by Sam Watanuki, THEGAMER

Beautiful images done by hundreds of hand drawings.
A game that will take your breath away!!

The controls are so simple - simply jump, double jump, left and right.
Delightfully Hand-Drawn Masocore. Ultra fun experience!

It`s all about fun!
1209980.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
